===========
CSSCrawler
===========

Parse CSS styles from a given URL and generate a color palette mapped mapped to css selectors.

Powered by Nagare_ framework !

Installation
================

- Note that the Nagare_ framework needs `Python Stackless`_ in order to run
- Using `easy_install` : easy_install css_crawler

Launch the application
==========================

- create `css_crawler` database : nagare-admin create-db css_crawler
- launch `css_crawler` : nagare-admin serve css_crawler

.. _Nagare: http://www.nagare.org
.. _`Python Stackless`: http://www.stackless.com
